Webinar: Strategies for Testing SaaS Applications
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
We are excited to invite you to our new webinar, Strategies for Testing SaaS Applications! In the webinar, Tricentis’ Founder and Chief Product Officer, Wolfgang Platz, will be speaking along with guest speaker Bill Martorelli, a Principal Analyst with Forrester Research to share strategies for enterprises testing applications deployed within SaaS platforms.
Specifically, we will be discussing:
- Why enterprises should do their own testing even when using a pre-tested SaaS platform - How to test your SaaS applications in a way that balances precision and efficiency
Our “Strategies for Testing SaaS Applications” webinar will take place on March 5th, 2015, starting at 4:00 p.m. CET.
We look forward to seeing you at our webinar!
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
